text.english: Theorem: Addition is commutative, i.e. \[ \forall n, m \in \mathbb N . n + m = m + n \]
text.italiano: Teorema: app e' associativa, i.e. \[ \forall l1,l2,l3 \in L_A . app (app (l1,l2), l3) = app (l1, app (l2, l3)) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem app_assoc : forall l1 : list, forall l2 : list, forall l3 : list, app (app l1 l2) l3 = app l1 (app l2 l3).
